description: GET or POST requests MUST be supported.

children.description: A query that’s valid MUST have a correct response.
Response Content-Type header MUST match the request Accept header (application/graphql+json).
Response body MUST contain appropriate data (JSON).
A query with a syntax error MUST have a correct response.
